rule_description: TAS components: The combination of all the elements that make up the TAS must match the Treasury Central Accounting Reporting System (CARS). AgencyIdentifier, MainAccountCode, and SubAccountCode are always required. AllocationTransferAgencyIdentifier, BeginningPeriodOfAvailability, EndingPeriodOfAvailability and AvailabilityTypeCode are required if present in the CARS table.

rule_description: File B: Reimbursable flag indicator is not required if object class is 4 digits. But if either "D" or "R" are given, then they have to correspond to the first digit of object class. Valid values are "R" for "ReimbursableFundingSource" and "D" for "DirectFundingSource". If an object class is 4 digits, then if it starts with 1 (1XXX) then it corresponds to a Reimbursable flag indicator of "'D." If it starts with 2 (2XXX), then it corresponds to a Reimbursable flag indicator of "R."
rule_error_message: If object class is three digits, must provide a value for bydirectreimbursablefundingsource

rule_description: File B: Reimbursable flag indicator is not required if object class is 4 digits. But if either "D" or "R" are given, then they have to correspond to the first digit of object class. Valid values are "R" for "ReimbursableFundingSource" and "D" for "DirectFundingSource". If an object class is 4 digits, then if it starts with 1 (1XXX) then it corresponds to a Reimbursable flag indicator of "'D." If it starts with 2 (2XXX), then it corresponds to a Reimbursable flag indicator of "R."
rule_error_message: If object class is four digits and bydirectreimbursablefundingsource is provided, the object class prefix must be consistent with the value provided for bydirectreimbursablefundingsource

rule_description: DeobligationsRecoveriesRefundsOfPriorYearByAward_CPE = USSGL(4871+ 4872 + 4971 + 4972). This applies to the award level.
rule_error_message: DeobligationsRecoveriesRefundsOfPriorYearByAward_CPE = USSGL(4871+ 4872 + 4971 + 4972). This applies to the award level.

rule_description: The totals by combination of TAS/object class provided in File C, cannot be greater than the same combinations in File B. For instance, the sum of all ObligationsUndeliveredOrdersUnpaidTotal_CPE values for each TAS/object class combination (i.e., containing all awards reported for that TAS/object class) reported in File C, should be less than or equal to the ObligationsUndeliveredOrdersUnpaidTotal_CPE value for the same TAS/object class combination provided in File B.
rule_error_message: The totals by combination of TAS/object class provided in File C, cannot be greater than the same combinations in File B. For instance, the sum of all ObligationsUndeliveredOrdersUnpaidTotal_CPE values for each TAS/object class combination (i.e., containing all awards reported for that TAS/object class) reported in File C, should be less than or equal to the ObligationsUndeliveredOrdersUnpaidTotal_CPE value for the same TAS/object class combination provided in File B.

rule_description: The totals by combination of TAS/program activity provided in File C, cannot be greater than the same combinations in File B. For instance, the sum of all ObligationsUndeliveredOrdersUnpaidTotal_CPE values for each TAS/program activity combination (i.e., containing all awards reported for that TAS/program activity) reported in File C, should be less than or equal to the ObligationsUndeliveredOrdersUnpaidTotal_CPE value for the same TAS/program activity combination provided in File B.
rule_error_message: The totals by combination of TAS/program activity provided in File C, cannot be greater than the same combinations in File B. For instance, the sum of all ObligationsUndeliveredOrdersUnpaidTotal_CPE values for each TAS/program activity combination (i.e., containing all awards reported for that TAS/program activity) reported in File C, should be less than or equal to the ObligationsUndeliveredOrdersUnpaidTotal_CPE value for the same TAS/program activity combination provided in File B.

rule_description: For each unique award ID (PIID/ParentAwardId for procurement, FAIN/URI for financial assistance) in File C, the sum of each TransactionObligatedAmount submitted in the reporting period should match (in inverse) the sum of the FederalActionObligation (in either D1 or D2) or OriginalLoanSubsidyCost (only in D2) amounts reported in D1 or D2 for the same timeframe, regardless of modifications.
rule_error_message: For each unique PIID for procurement in File C, the sum of each TransactionObligatedAmount submitted in the reporting period should match (in inverse) the sum of the FederalActionObligation amounts reported in D1 for the same timeframe, regardless of modifications.
